name: Anthropomorphic Mutant Animals in a Text Adventure
name_original: Anthropomorphic Mutant Animals in a Text Adventure
description:
What you see is what you get. Anthropomorphic Mutant Animals in a Text Adventure follows an anthropomorphic mutant Cheetah and Rabbit as they journey to eradicate all members of a mutant organization.

...Featuring Cooperative (Co-op) button mashing battles...
